description:
## Practice on SHACL part III ### Take as input the shape defined in the [Practice on SHACL part I](https://helio-playground.linkeddata.es/tour/SIoTRx%20practice%20on%20actions/Practice%20on%20SHACL%20part%20I). Then, add a `sh:PropertyShape` that defines a restriction over the property *ec:uprn*. Finally, assign the defined `sh:PropertyShape` to all the `sh:NodeShape` in the shape as if all classes have this property. Once this shape is ready, validate the RDF data using the [SHACL validator action](https://github.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-action-shacl-validator) (if you need help with this component have a view at [its tutorials](https://helio-playground.linkeddata.es/tour/SIoTRx%20tutorial%20on%20actions/SHACL%20validation%20-%20part%20I)).

Check the results obtained with the **expected results**.

Once the validation is done, you can move to [Practice on SHACL part III](https://helio-playground.linkeddata.es/tour/SIoTRx%20practice%20on%20actions/Practice%20on%20SHACL%20part%20IV) adding more complexity to the shape.
solution_template:
<#-- Shape --> 
<#assign shape>
@prefix schema: <http://schema.org/> .
@prefix sh: <http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#> .
@prefix ex: <http://shacl-practice.helio/resource/>.
@prefix ec: <http://shacl-practice.helio/ontology#>

ex:UPRNShape a sh:PropertyShape ;
  sh:path ec:uprn . 

ex:CivicStructureShape 
  a sh:NodeShape ; 
  sh:targetClass schema:CivicStructure ;
  sh:property ex:UPRNShape .

ex:MuseumShape 
  a sh:NodeShape ; 
  sh:targetClass schema:Museum ;
  sh:property ex:UPRNShape .

ex:UniversityShape 
  a sh:NodeShape ; 
  sh:targetClass schema:CollegeOrUniversity ;
  sh:property ex:UPRNShape .
</#assign>

<#-- RDF data -->
<#assign rdf="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-ecosystem/main/resources/siotrx/actions/shacl/lcc-dataset.ttl">

<#-- Running the validation -->
<#assign config="{\"shape\" : \""+shape+"\" }">
<@action type="ShaclValidator" data=rdf conf=config; report>
[=report]
</@action>
